title: Fullscreen bug
body: Hello, this morning i launched a practice tool game with the usual settings but since i was in the loading screen the right side of the screen was black (like 3 cm). In game, i couldn't see stuff in the left side like the practice tool settings. If i change the resolution or if i set the game to bordeless window or windowed it works, but i would like to play with my normal settings. If i take a screenshot it doesnt show this black rectangle.  Sorry for bad english i hope you can understand my problem.

replies.body: Are you using a 4K monitor or exceeding 1920x1080?  Those could cause issues, so reducing your resolution would be good just in case.  Otherwise, hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can take a look with your directly.  We'll get back to you there to see what's up!
No, my monitor resolution is 1440x900 :D very far away from 4k
